Love all the free channels and with my Prime membership, I can watch a variety of shows.

review: Overall this is very nice little device. My kids especially love it. There seems to be no end to the number mind numbing cartoons available to them. It is very easy to use and super fast on my home network. Which is also super fast.Here is my biggest complaint. Amazon actually markets the device as a tool to help you cut the cord with cable/satellite. However, almost all of the apps for channels like HBO, History etc, require you to have a provider account to use the online service. So they loose a star for that little omission in the marketing plan.None-the-less this is an awesome device and we have cut the cord. However, we did have to start paying almost double the amount for the internet service once we cancelled the cable TV. So the savings are not quite so great as one would hope but I am happy to get rid of all the boxes and wires required by the cable company for the pleasure of paying for the service.
author: Amazon Customer
